title: Evening balance - following day
text: If the sales clerks have not done the evening balance the evening before, the POS will ask if they want to do this when they open the POS the next morning. If they say no and conduct a sale, it cannot be done later. They will have to do the evening balance like always in the evening, and both days will be added to the turnover.
description:
If the sales clerks have not done the evening balance the evening before, the POS will ask if they want to do this when they open the POS the next morning. 

  

If they say no and conduct a sale, it cannot be done later. They will have to do the evening balance like always in the evening, and both days will be added to the turnover.

title: Evening balance - receipt
text: If the receipt for the evening balance (the one with the overview from the card terminal etc.) is missing, then search for receipt, find the last receipt number, then look for a receipt with the number immediately after that and print it. 1. On the POS, click Shortcuts, then Search Note 2. Choose Date interval, then Start Date and End Date. Observe the number of the last receipt. 3. Choose Enter receipt number 4. Enter the number that is next in line and click search 5. Click Reprint to print the receipt again.
description:
If the receipt for the evening balance (the one with the overview from the card terminal etc.) is missing, then search for receipt, find the last receipt number, then look for a receipt with the number immediately after that and print it. 

  

  1. 1. On the POS, click Shortcuts, then Search Note 

  

 

  

  1. 2. Choose Date interval, then Start Date and End Date. Observe the number of the last receipt. 

  

 

  

  1. 3. Choose Enter receipt number 

  

 

  

  1. 4. Enter the number that is next in line and click search 

  

 

  

  

  1. 5. Click Reprint to print the receipt again.

title: Evening balance – shows no turnover for the previous day
text: This can be because some transactions are in quarantine. You can check this in Back Office Support Tools. If not, send it to Development.
description:
This can be because some transactions are in quarantine. You can check this in Back Office Support Tools. 

  

 

  

If not, send it to Development.

title: Sale after closing cash register
text: When a sale is made on the same day after the clerk has already closed the cash register. The store can choose to do the cash statement on the same day again in order to get correct finance data on the POS. If the store does not perform it,the sale will be transferred to the turnover when they perform the cash statement on the next evening. I DdD admin:
description:
When a sale is made on the same day after the clerk has already closed the cash register.

The store can choose to do the cash statement on the same day again in order to get correct finance data on the POS.

If the store does not perform it,the sale will be transferred to the turnover when they perform the cash statement on the next evening.

I DdD admin:
